member.name: F:MathWorks.MATLAB.Engine.Impl.CppEngineApi.LibMatlabEngine
member.summary: Name of the library used to interface with MATLAB engine. Extension is excluded for cross-platform support - the CLR can resolve that depending on the platform.

member.name: T:MathWorks.MATLAB.Engine.MATLABEngine
member.summary: Entry point to MATLAB Engine API for .NET.

member.name: P:MathWorks.MATLAB.Engine.MATLABEngine.Workspace
member.summary: The MATLAB base workspace associated with this MATLAB engine or runtime instance.

member.name: M:MathWorks.MATLAB.Engine.MATLABEngine.TerminateEngineClient
member.summary: Release all MATLAB速 engine resources during runtime when you no longer need the MATLAB engine in your application program.
member.remarks: Programs cannot start a new MATLAB engine or connect to a shared MATLAB session after calling .

member.name: M:MathWorks.MATLAB.Engine.MATLABEngine.StartMATLAB
member.summary: Start MATLAB速 in a separate process with optional MATLAB startup options.

member.name: M:MathWorks.MATLAB.Engine.MATLABEngine.StartMATLAB(System.String[])
member.param: Options used to start MATLAB. You can specify multiple startup options.

member.name: M:MathWorks.MATLAB.Engine.MATLABEngine.StartMATLABAsync
member.returns: A which completes with a instance.

member.name: M:MathWorks.MATLAB.Engine.MATLABEngine.StartMATLABAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: The cancellation token to cancel the operation.

member.name: M:MathWorks.MATLAB.Engine.MATLABEngine.FindMATLAB
member.summary: Find all shared MATLAB速 sessions on the local machine.
member.returns: An array of the names of all shared MATLAB sessions on the local machine, or an empty array if no shared MATLAB sessions are available

member.name: M:MathWorks.MATLAB.Engine.MATLABEngine.FindMATLABAsync
member.returns: A which completes with an array of the names of shared MATLAB sessions.

member.name: M:MathWorks.MATLAB.Engine.MATLABEngine.FindMATLABAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: The cancellation token to cancel the operation.

member.name: M:MathWorks.MATLAB.Engine.MATLABEngine.ConnectMATLAB
member.summary: Connect to a shared MATLAB速 session on the local machine.

list.item: If you specify the name of a shared MATLAB session, but the engine cannot find a session with that name, the engine throws an exception.
If you do not specify a name and there is no shared MATLAB session available, the engine starts a new shared MATLAB session.The MATLAB desktop is not started.
If you do not specify a name and there are shared MATLAB sessions available, the engine connects to the first available session.

member.name: M:MathWorks.MATLAB.Engine.MATLABEngine.ConnectMATLAB(System.String)
member.param: Name of the shared MATLAB session.

member.name: M:MathWorks.MATLAB.Engine.MATLABEngine.ConnectMATLABAsync
member.returns: A which completes with a instance.

member.name: M:MathWorks.MATLAB.Engine.MATLABEngine.ConnectMATLABAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: The cancellation token to cancel the operation.
